question: Total impedance of a series LCR circuit varies with angular frequency of the AC source connected to it as shown in the graph. The quality factor Q of the series LCR circuit is
images/2023-phy-15-1.png
explanation: Quality factor <katex>$Q = \frac{\omega_0}{\Delta \omega}$</katex>. From the graph, resonant frequency <katex>$\omega_0 = 500$</katex> rad/s. The bandwidth <katex>$\Delta \omega$</katex> corresponds to frequencies where <katex>$Z = \sqrt{2}Z_{min}$</katex>, which are 400 and 600. So <katex>$\Delta \omega = 600 - 400 = 200$</katex>. <katex>$Q = 500/200 = 2.5$</katex>.
